title.rendered: DFW SFDUG: Slack Development w/Meighan Brodkey

content.rendered:
August 2021

Come listen to one of Accenture’s top minds on Salesforce/Slack Integration, Meighan Brodkey. She will share all that’s usable, new and upcoming around Slack. Now that Salesforce has taken over the Slack ecosystem as well, are you curious how to get those dev skills going with Slack and how to take advantage of the APIs to create some awesome automation and integrations? Hear all about it with this presentation on Slack Development by the Mother of OhanaSlack, and long time Slack advocate, Meighan Brodkey.

Event Page

Group Leaders

Paul McCollum

Sense Corp.
Leader

Amey Kulkarni

Slalom
Leader

Moyez Thanawalla

Thanawalla Digital
Leader

Resources

Slack Resources Quip Doc with news articles, training, trailheads, guides, and cheatsheets on Slack.

Deck
